sn10.1:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati indakūṭe pabbate, indakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10.1:1.3: Atha kho indako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn10.2:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn10.2:1.2: Atha kho sakkanāmako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn10.3:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10.3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
sn10.3:1.3: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.3:1.6: Yāva jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo yadi vā pana so samaṇako”ti.
sn10.3:2.1: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmesi.
sn10.3:2.3: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.3:2.8: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṁ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṁ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
sn10.3:2.9: “Na khvāhaṁ taṁ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṁ vā khipeyya hadayaṁ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya;
sn10.3:2.10: api ca tvaṁ, āvuso, puccha yadā kaṅkhasī”ti. (…)
sn10.4:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu viharati maṇimālike cetiye maṇibhaddassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10.4:1.2: Atha kho maṇibhaddo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn10.5:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10.5:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā upāsikāya sānu nāma putto yakkhena gahito hoti.
sn10.5:1.3: Atha kho sā upāsikā paridevamānā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn10.6:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10.6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya dhammapadāni bhāsati.
sn10.6:1.3: Atha kho piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī puttakaṁ evaṁ tosesi:
sn10.7:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10.7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
sn10.7:1.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
sn10.7:1.4: Atha kho punabbasumātā yakkhinī puttake evaṁ tosesi:
sn10.8:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati sītavane.
sn10.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahaṁ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
sn10.8:1.5: Tāvadeva ca pana bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti. Athassa anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa etadahosi:
sn10.8:1.7: Sve dānāhaṁ kālena bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gamissāmī”ti buddhagatāya satiyā nipajji.
sn10.8:1.8: Rattiyā sudaṁ tikkhattuṁ vuṭṭhāsi pabhātanti maññamāno.
sn10.8:1.9: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sivathikadvāraṁ tenupasaṅkami.
sn10.8:1.11: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nagaramhā nikkhamantassa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:1.12: Atha kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:4.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṁ ahosi bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:4.2: Dutiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:4.3: Dutiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:7.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṁ ahosi bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:7.2: Tatiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10.8:7.3: Tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10.8:10.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṁ ahosi bhayaṁ chambhitattaṁ lomahaṁso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10.8:10.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sītavanaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn10.8:11.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya abbhokāse caṅkamati.
sn10.8:11.2: Addasā kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn10.8:11.3: Disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn10.8:11.4: Nisajja kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
sn10.8:11.6: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati, nāmena maṁ bhagavā ālapatīti, haṭṭho udaggo tattheva bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.9:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sukkā bhikkhunī mahatiyā parisāya parivutā dhammaṁ deseti.
sn10.9:1.3: Atha kho sukkāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn10.10:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako sukkāya bhikkhuniyā bhojanaṁ adāsi.
sn10.10:1.3: Atha kho sukkāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn10.11:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10.11:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako cīrāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsi.
sn10.11:1.4: Atha kho cīrāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn10.12:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10.12:1.3: Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.12:1.8: Dutiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.12:1.13: Tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.12:1.18: Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn10.12:1.23: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṁ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṁ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
sn10.12:1.24: “Na khvāhaṁ taṁ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṁ vā khipeyya hadayaṁ vā phāleyya, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
sn10.12:1.25: Api ca tvaṁ, āvuso, puccha yadā kaṅkhasī”ti (…).
